inputs.name: projectPath
inputs.label: Path of .sln/.csproj file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project or solution file to scan.

inputs.name: exportPath
inputs.label: Output report file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output report file. The file will in SARIF format. (It equals `--export or -x` option)

inputs.name: convertPath
inputs.label: Convert path related to repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you assign `export`, the file will contains file path but related to $(Build.SourcesDirectory). If you want to convert it relatived to source repository, set this option to true.
